title: John Ivison: Transport minister thinks he's done all he can to alleviate airport chaos. He's wrong - National Post
content:
Not only can Omar Alghabra not guarantee a safe and efficient system, he cant even offer passengers faint hope about when things will get better

description: Seven-times Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton assured fans on Monday that he would be racing in Canada this weekend despite suffering severe back pain in Sunday's Azerbaijan Grand Prix.
title: Hurting Hamilton says he would not miss Canada for the world - Reuters.com
content: LONDON, June 13 (Reuters) - Seven-times Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton assured fans on Monday that he would be racing in Canada this weekend despite suffering severe back pain in Sunday's … [+1703 chars]

description: Canada's annual inflation rate accelerated to 7.7% in May, the highest since January 1983, on gasoline prices, as well as services like hotels and restaurants, Statistics Canada said on Wednesday.
title: VIEW Canada annual inflation gallops to near 40-year high of 7.7% in May - Reuters
content: TORONTO, June 22 (Reuters) - Canada's annual inflation rate accelerated to 7.7% in May, the highest since January 1983, on gasoline prices, as well as services like hotels and restaurants, Statistics… [+4234 chars]

description: Piles of luggage beside baggage belts in airports from Canada to Europe are driving further demand for ground handlers, and adding to summer travel chaos as airlines scramble to bring back workers lost during COVID-19.
title: Luggage piles join long airport lines in fresh woes for summer travel - Reuters.com
content: June 29 (Reuters) - Piles of luggage beside baggage belts in airports from Canada to Europe are driving further demand for ground handlers, and adding to summer travel chaos as airlines scramble to b… [+3458 chars]

description: Health authorities across Canada have cut the hours of hospital emergency departments and urgent care clinics in recent weeks, a move that in some cases may extend through the summer, due to a surge in patients and staff shortages.
title: Canada's emergency rooms bear the brunt of a 'perfect storm' - Reuters
content: TORONTO, July 3 (Reuters) - Health authorities across Canada have cut the hours of hospital emergency departments and urgent care clinics in recent weeks, a move that in some cases may extend through… [+4406 chars]
